summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by introducing/using BranchAuthProvider at the app root so that AppContent (and components like BranchSessionControl) can safely call/use useBranchAuth() without crashing into a white screen. Some additional non-requested project metadata/documentation updates were also made.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated internal project tracking metadata (project_state.json) to add a new_feature_request entry (AR-1) and related notes/status.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for an app crash fix via BranchAuthProvider wrapping; it does not request changes to project tracking/metadata files.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend-file-summaries.txt with broad descriptions of many features/files unrelated to the requested BranchAuthProvider wrapper fix.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request updating documentation/summaries; additionally, the summaries reference changes across many files that are not part of the provided diffâ€™s modified-file list.
